text: Chris Griffin is a character in the television comedy Family Guy. He is the 15-year-old older son of Lois Griffin and Peter Griffin. He has a brother, Stewie, and a sister, Meg. They are an American family. Chris is like his father, both are unfit and not as smart as others. He has an "evil monkey" in his closet that everyone thinks is fake until everyone finds out it's real in the episode Hannah Banana. Chris was 13 years old when the series started. ==References== Category:Animated human characters Category:Family Guy characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999
